actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow persons covered by certain other retirement plans to establish personal savings for retirement.

summary.text: Allows a deduction of up to $1500 (or 15 percent of gross income, whichever is less) under the Internal Revenue Code for amounts paid by or on behalf of an individual into a retirement account or annuity plan, or for a retirement bond. Provides for a reduction in the allowable deduction for employer contributions and in the case of public employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow persons covered by certain other retirement plans to establish personal savings for retirement.
